articles.description: The winner gets to be special enforcer for next Sunday’s PPV Universal title match. Either way, it should fuel Edge’s rivalries with both Roman Reigns and Daniel Bryan heading into WrestleMania 37.
articles.content: In the early years of this century, when WWE first split Raw and SmackDown into separate brands with (mostly) distinct rosters, Edge was a key player on the blue brand. The SmackDown Six era didnt la… [+1510 chars]
